text: Woah! It's a hidden cave!
Grace?!
Where are you?!
Are you in here?!
Who are you and what are you doing here!
Woah! Easy there.

choices.text: I'm Mozes and I'm looking for a little girl.

text: Hah! Little girl? You won't find her anymore.
We found her snooping around in forest, so we brought her to Ardor.
She is goner. And so are you!
Hah! Watch your mouth!
Don't tell me you came here for little girl we found snooping in forest earlier.
We brought her to Ardor. She is goner. And so are you!
If anything has happened to Grace!

choices.text: What has she to do with him?

text: Ardor is great wizard, soon ruler of Adan.
You don't want to know! And I make sure you will not know!
You have to get past guards, but they are far too strong for you.
They kill you with ease.
I need to go to Ardor now to deliver his mask for ritual and you are standing in my way.
She will die and so will you!
Halt! Forbidden area!
This is domain of Great Wizard Ardor.
Leave now, or die!
Wait wait wait! Don't kill me.

choices.text: I'm looking for a little girl, have you guys maybe seen her?
[Mask of Ardor] Your boss needs this for the ritual, let me through.
[Diplomat 2] Don't threaten me! Do you know who I am?
Alright then, I'll have to go through you! (Start battle)
Okay, I'll go away... For now. (Leave conversation)

text: Ardor has girl. Leave now, or die!
If anything has happened to Grace!

choices.text: What has this Ardor to do with her?
If this Ardor has Grace, bring me to him!

text: Ardor is great wizard, soon ruler of Adan.
None of your business.
No! You leave, or die!
That is mask of Ardor, he does need that.
Why do you have mask?
An orcish fellow needed to deliver it, but he wasn't able to.
That's where I come in.
No, who are you?
I am the Great Wizard Mozes! You'll be sorry if Ardor hears that you wouldn't let me through. He will incinerate you on the spot.
You know he will.
I know he could.
Job is not worth life.
You will die!
You go through.
You go through.
Go!
All those dead orcs... What happened here?
What kind of terrible force is there behind that gate?
Don't hurt me! What do you want?
I'm looking for a little girl, have you seen her?
No, I know nothing.
You know nothing? What do you know?
No, no! If you let me live, I tell you secret.
At other side of cave, all way to south, past guards, more south, then east, upper wall, there is hidden door in dark.
Don't hurt me!
No, I won't.
